hero.title: Share Your Expertise. Build Your Legacy.
hero.subtitle: Join thousands of industry leaders who are monetizing their knowledge and making a real impact on the next generation of professionals

benefits.title: Earn $200-1000+ per hour
benefits.description: Set your own rates and earn premium fees for short, focused sessions. Top experts earn $15,000+ monthly.

benefits.title: Flexible scheduling
benefits.description: Work on your own terms. Sessions are just 15-30 minutes, fitting perfectly around your busy schedule.

benefits.title: Build your personal brand
benefits.description: Establish yourself as a thought leader in your industry while expanding your professional network.

benefits.title: Make meaningful impact
benefits.description: Help ambitious professionals breakthrough challenges and accelerate their career growth.

process.title: Apply & Get Verified
process.description: Submit your application with your background and expertise. Our team reviews and verifies your credentials within 48 hours.

process.title: Create Your Profile
process.description: Build your expert profile showcasing your experience, set your rates, and define your areas of expertise.

process.title: Start Earning
process.description: Go live on the platform and start receiving booking requests from professionals seeking your guidance.

requirements.title: Who We're Looking For
requirements.subtitle: We maintain high standards to ensure the best experience for our community
criteria: 5+ years of proven experience in your field
Leadership role at a recognized company or successful entrepreneur
Track record of mentoring, teaching, or coaching others
Excellent communication skills and professional presence
Passion for helping others succeed and grow

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.title: VP Engineering at Airbnb
testimonials.quote: Being a TapTime expert has been incredibly rewarding. I've helped over 200 engineers level up their careers while earning $8,000+ monthly in my spare time.

testimonials.name: Marcus Johnson
testimonials.title: Founder of TechFlow (Acquired)
testimonials.quote: The platform makes it so easy to share my startup experience. 15-minute sessions fit perfectly between meetings, and the quality of mentees is exceptional.

testimonials.name: Dr. Lisa Park
testimonials.title: Chief Marketing Officer
testimonials.quote: I love helping marketers solve real challenges. The structured format keeps sessions focused and impactful. It's become my favorite side project.

faq.question: How much can I earn as a TapTime expert?
faq.answer: Earnings vary by expertise and time commitment. Most experts earn $200-1000+ per hour, with top performers earning $15,000+ monthly. You set your own rates based on your experience and market demand.

faq.question: How much time do I need to commit?
faq.answer: There's no minimum commitment. Sessions are typically 15-30 minutes, and you control your availability completely. Many experts start with just a few hours per week.

faq.question: What's the application process like?
faq.answer: Submit your application with your background and expertise. Our team reviews within 48 hours. If approved, you'll create your profile and can start receiving bookings immediately.

faq.question: How do I get paid?
faq.answer: We handle all payments securely. You're paid within 24 hours after each completed session via direct deposit or PayPal. No chasing invoices or payment delays.
